# ESPHome SunSpec Modbus Server Project

This project simulates a SunSpec-compliant Modbus server using ESPHome on an ESP32 device.

## Project Structure

- `esphome/` - ESPHome configuration files
  - `sunspec_server.yaml` - Main device configuration
  - `packages/` - Modular configuration packages
- `esphome/custom_components/sunspec_modbus/` - Custom Modbus server component
- `docs/` - Project documentation

## Development Progress

- [x] Project scaffolding
- [ ] Custom component development
- [ ] ESPHome configuration
- [ ] Testing and deployment

## Key Features

- SunSpec Modbus TCP server implementation
- Simulated solar inverter data
- Web interface for monitoring
- OTA (Over-The-Air) updates support
